text: This was the worst restaurant that we have ever eaten at the Mall.  The staff did not know how to plug in the microwave.  The food was not clean, nor cooked.  Terrible.

text: The food was great the manager left and then came back like a minute later... when they were about to close very disturbing and weird. I kinda wish I could work their.

text: Don’t get me wrong. I love their food. But lately it’s just not been quality. And customer service has been poor. They are unprofessional and almost rude. They act like the customer is a inconvenience to them.

text: The owner is a liar & a cheat. Our company has serviced this restaurant & they NEVER paid. Even though we contacted the restaurant & the owner personally several times.

text: Do not eat here. Oily, cold food. They microwave it in front of you. I've happily eaten at a greasy spoon before but this is just gross. Kitchen Nightmare episode waiting to happen.

text: Food sits out on the counter then they microwave it in a dirty microwave behind the counter. Even then, it was still barely warm. Disgusting. No clear organization in how to order, at least 10 employees but only 2 were actually working. Never eating here again.
